verses.verse: וַיִּשָּׂ֥א <WH5375> went on יַעֲקֹ֖ב <WH3290> Then Jacob רַגְלָ֑יו <WH7272> his journey וַיֵּ֖לֶךְ <WH1980> and came אַ֥רְצָה <WH776> into the land בְנֵי־ <WH1121> of the people קֶֽדֶם׃ <WH6924> of the east

וַיַּ֞רְא <WH7200> And he looked וְהִנֵּ֧ה <WH2009> and behold בְאֵ֣ר <WH875> and behold a well בַּשָּׂדֶ֗ה <WH7704> in the field וְהִנֵּה־ <WH2009> and behold שָׁ֞ם <WH8033> there שְׁלֹשָׁ֤ה <WH7969> and lo there [were] three עֶדְרֵי־ <WH5739> flocks צֹאן֙ <WH6629> of sheep רֹבְצִ֣ים <WH7257> lying עָלֶ֔יהָ <WH5921> beside כִּ֚י <WH3588> for מִן־ <WH4480> that הַבְּאֵ֣ר <WH875> by it for out of that well הַהִ֔וא <WH1931> they יַשְׁק֖וּ <WH8248> they watered הָעֲדָרִ֑ים <WH5739> the flocks וְהָאֶ֥בֶן <WH68> stone גְּדֹלָ֖ה <WH1419> and a great עַל־ <WH5921> beside פִּ֥י <WH6310> mouth הַבְּאֵֽר׃ <WH875> [was] upon the well's

וְנֶאֶסְפוּ־ <WH622> gathered שָׁ֣מָּה <WH8033> there כָל־ <WH3605> all הָעֲדָרִ֗ים <WH5739> And thither were all the flocks וְגָלֲל֤וּ <WH1556> and they rolled אֶת־ <WH853> הָאֶ֙בֶן֙ <WH68> the stone מֵעַל֙ <WH5921> from פִּ֣י <WH6310> mouth הַבְּאֵ֔ר <WH875> from the well's וְהִשְׁק֖וּ <WH8248> and watered אֶת־ <WH853> הַצֹּ֑אן <WH6629> the sheep וְהֵשִׁ֧יבוּ <WH7725> again אֶת־ <WH853> הָאֶ֛בֶן <WH68> the stone עַל־ <WH5921> on פִּ֥י <WH6310> mouth הַבְּאֵ֖ר <WH875> upon the well's לִמְקֹמָֽהּ׃ <WH4725> in his place

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said לָהֶם֙ יַעֲקֹ֔ב <WH3290> And Jacob אַחַ֖י <WH251> unto them My brethren מֵאַ֣יִן <WH370> whence אַתֶּ֑ם <WH859> and they וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <WH559> [be] ye? And they said מֵחָרָ֖ן <WH2771> Of Haran אֲנָֽחְנוּ׃ <WH587> we

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> And he said לָהֶ֔ם הַיְדַעְתֶּ֖ם <WH3045> unto them Know אֶת־ <WH853> לָבָ֣ן <WH3837> ye Laban בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son נָח֑וֹר <WH5152> Nahor וַיֹּאמְר֖וּ <WH559> said יָדָֽעְנוּ׃ <WH3045> We know

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> And he said לָהֶ֖ם הֲשָׁל֣וֹם <WH7965> [He is] well ל֑וֹ וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <WH559> said שָׁל֔וֹם <WH7965> is well וְהִנֵּה֙ <WH2009> and here רָחֵ֣ל <WH7354> and behold Rachel בִּתּ֔וֹ <WH1323> his daughter בָּאָ֖ה <WH935> cometh עִם־ <WH5973> with הַצֹּֽאן׃ <WH6629> with the sheep

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> And he said הֵ֥ן <WH2005> Lo עוֹד֙ <WH5750> is still הַיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> day גָּד֔וֹל <WH1419> [it is] yet high לֹא־ <WH3808> is not עֵ֖ת <WH6256> neither [is it] time הֵאָסֵ֣ף <WH622> should be gathered together הַמִּקְנֶ֑ה <WH4735> that the cattle הַשְׁק֥וּ <WH8248> water הַצֹּ֖אן <WH6629> ye the sheep וּלְכ֥וּ <WH1980> and go רְעֽוּ׃ <WH7462> [and] feed

וַיֹּאמְרוּ֮ <WH559> And they said לֹ֣א <WH3808> not נוּכַל֒ <WH3201> We cannot עַ֣ד <WH5704> against אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> after יֵאָֽסְפוּ֙ <WH622> be gathered together כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָ֣עֲדָרִ֔ים <WH5739> until all the flocks וְגָֽלֲלוּ֙ <WH1556> and [till] they roll אֶת־ <WH853> הָאֶ֔בֶן <WH68> the stone מֵעַ֖ל <WH5921> from פִּ֣י <WH6310> mouth הַבְּאֵ֑ר <WH875> from the well's וְהִשְׁקִ֖ינוּ <WH8248> then we water הַצֹּֽאן׃ <WH6629> the sheep

עוֹדֶ֖נּוּ <WH5750> And while he yet מְדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> spake עִמָּ֑ם <WH5973> them וְרָחֵ֣ל ׀ <WH7354> with them Rachel בָּ֗אָה <WH935> came עִם־ <WH5973> with הַצֹּאן֙ <WH6629> sheep אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> after לְאָבִ֔יהָ <WH1> with her father's כִּ֥י <WH3588> for רֹעָ֖ה <WH7462> for she kept them הִֽוא׃ <WH1931> he

וַיְהִ֡י <WH1961> become כַּאֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> after רָאָ֨ה <WH7200> saw יַעֲקֹ֜ב <WH3290> And it came to pass when Jacob אֶת־ <WH853> רָחֵ֗ל <WH7354> Rachel בַּת־ <WH1323> the daughter לָבָן֙ <WH3837> of Laban אֲחִ֣י <WH251> brother אִמּ֔וֹ <WH517> his mother's וְאֶת־ <WH853> צֹ֥אן <WH6629> and the sheep לָבָ֖ן <WH3837> of Laban אֲחִ֣י <WH251> brother אִמּ֑וֹ <WH517> his mother's וַיִּגַּ֣שׁ <WH5066> went near יַעֲקֹ֗ב <WH3290> that Jacob וַיָּ֤גֶל <WH1556> and rolled אֶת־ <WH853> הָאֶ֙בֶן֙ <WH68> the stone מֵעַל֙ <WH5921> from פִּ֣י <WH6310> mouth הַבְּאֵ֔ר <WH875> from the well's וַיַּ֕שְׁקְ <WH8248> and watered אֶת־ <WH853> צֹ֥אן <WH6629> the flock לָבָ֖ן <WH3837> of Laban אֲחִ֥י <WH251> brother אִמּֽוֹ׃ <WH517> his mother's
וַיִּשַּׁ֥ק <WH5401> kissed יַעֲקֹ֖ב <WH3290> And Jacob לְרָחֵ֑ל <WH7354> Rachel וַיִּשָּׂ֥א <WH5375> and lifted up אֶת־ <WH853> קֹל֖וֹ <WH6963> his voice וַיֵּֽבְךְּ׃ <WH1058> and wept

וַיַּגֵּ֨ד <WH5046> told יַעֲקֹ֜ב <WH3290> And Jacob לְרָחֵ֗ל <WH7354> Rachel כִּ֣י <WH3588> for אֲחִ֤י <WH251> brother אָבִ֙יהָ֙ <WH1> that he [was] her father's ה֔וּא <WH1931> he וְכִ֥י <WH3588> for בֶן־ <WH1121> son רִבְקָ֖ה <WH7259> and that he [was] Rebekah's ה֑וּא <WH1931> and she וַתָּ֖רָץ <WH7323> and she ran וַתַּגֵּ֥ד <WH5046> and told לְאָבִֽיהָ׃ <WH1> her father

וַיְהִי֩ <WH1961> become כִשְׁמֹ֨עַ <WH8085> heard לָבָ֜ן <WH3837> And it came to pass when Laban אֶת־ <WH853> שֵׁ֣מַע ׀ <WH8088> the tidings יַעֲקֹ֣ב <WH3290> of Jacob בֶּן־ <WH1121> son אֲחֹת֗וֹ <WH269> his sister's וַיָּ֤רָץ <WH7323> that he ran לִקְרָאתוֹ֙ <WH7125> to meet וַיְחַבֶּק־ <WH2263> him and embraced לוֹ֙ וַיְנַשֶּׁק־ <WH5401> him and kissed ל֔וֹ וַיְבִיאֵ֖הוּ <WH935> him and brought אֶל־ <WH413> to בֵּית֑וֹ <WH1004> him to his house וַיְסַפֵּ֣ר <WH5608> And he told לְלָבָ֔ן <WH3837> Laban אֵ֥ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַדְּבָרִ֖ים <WH1697> all these things הָאֵֽלֶּה׃ <WH428> these

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said לוֹ֙ לָבָ֔ן <WH3837> And Laban אַ֛ךְ <WH389> to him Surely עַצְמִ֥י <WH6106> thou [art] my bone וּבְשָׂרִ֖י <WH1320> and my flesh אָ֑תָּה <WH859> and he וַיֵּ֥שֶׁב <WH3427> And he abode עִמּ֖וֹ <WH5973> with חֹ֥דֶשׁ <WH2320> of a month יָמִֽים׃ <WH3117> with him the space

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said לָבָן֙ <WH3837> And Laban לְיַעֲקֹ֔ב <WH3290> unto Jacob הֲכִי־ <WH3588> Because אָחִ֣י <WH251> Because thou [art] my brother אַ֔תָּה <WH859> you וַעֲבַדְתַּ֖נִי <WH5647> shouldest thou therefore serve חִנָּ֑ם <WH2600> free הַגִּ֥ידָה <WH5046> bewray לִּ֖י מַה־ <WH4100> what מַּשְׂכֻּרְתֶּֽךָ׃ <WH4909> me what [shall] thy wages

וּלְלָבָ֖ן <WH3837> And Laban שְׁתֵּ֣י <WH8147> had two בָנ֑וֹת <WH1323> daughters שֵׁ֤ם <WH8034> the name הַגְּדֹלָה֙ <WH1419> of the elder לֵאָ֔ה <WH3812> [was] Leah וְשֵׁ֥ם <WH8034> and the name הַקְּטַנָּ֖ה <WH6996> of the younger רָחֵֽל׃ <WH7354> [was] Rachel

וְעֵינֵ֥י <WH5869> eyed לֵאָ֖ה <WH3812> Leah רַכּ֑וֹת <WH7390> [was] tender וְרָחֵל֙ <WH7354> but Rachel הָֽיְתָ֔ה <WH1961> become יְפַת־ <WH3303> and well תֹּ֖אַר <WH8389> of form וִיפַ֥ת <WH3303> was beautiful מַרְאֶֽה׃ <WH4758> favoured

וַיֶּאֱהַ֥ב <WH157> loved יַעֲקֹ֖ב <WH3290> And Jacob אֶת־ <WH853> רָחֵ֑ל <WH7354> Rachel וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> and said אֶֽעֱבָדְךָ֙ <WH5647> I will serve שֶׁ֣בַע <WH7651> thee seven שָׁנִ֔ים <WH8141> years בְּרָחֵ֥ל <WH7354> for Rachel בִּתְּךָ֖ <WH1323> daughter הַקְּטַנָּֽה׃ <WH6996> thy younger

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said לָבָ֗ן <WH3837> And Laban ט֚וֹב <WH2896> [It is] better תִּתִּ֣י <WH5414> that I give אֹתָ֣הּ <WH853> לָ֔ךְ מִתִּתִּ֥י <WH5414> her to thee than that I should give אֹתָ֖הּ <WH853> לְאִ֣ישׁ <WH582> her to אַחֵ֑ר <WH312> her to another שְׁבָ֖ה <WH3427> abide עִמָּדִֽי׃ <WH5978> against

וַיַּעֲבֹ֧ד <WH5647> served יַעֲקֹ֛ב <WH3290> And Jacob בְּרָחֵ֖ל <WH7354> for Rachel שֶׁ֣בַע <WH7651> seven שָׁנִ֑ים <WH8141> years וַיִּהְי֤וּ <WH1961> become בְעֵינָיו֙ <WH5869> and they seemed כְּיָמִ֣ים <WH3117> days אֲחָדִ֔ים <WH259> unto him [but] a few בְּאַהֲבָת֖וֹ <WH157> love אֹתָֽהּ׃ <WH853>

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said יַעֲקֹ֤ב <WH3290> And Jacob אֶל־ <WH413> to לָבָן֙ <WH3837> unto Laban הָבָ֣ה <WH3051> Give אֶת־ <WH853> אִשְׁתִּ֔י <WH802> [me] my wife כִּ֥י <WH3588> for מָלְא֖וּ <WH4390> are fulfilled יָמָ֑י <WH3117> for my days וְאָב֖וֹאָה <WH935> that I may go in אֵלֶֽיהָ׃ <WH413> about

וַיֶּאֱסֹ֥ף <WH622> gathered together לָבָ֛ן <WH3837> And Laban אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all אַנְשֵׁ֥י <WH582> all the men הַמָּק֖וֹם <WH4725> of the place וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <WH6213> and made מִשְׁתֶּֽה׃ <WH4960> a feast

וַיְהִ֣י <WH1961> become בָעֶ֔רֶב <WH6153> And it came to pass in the evening וַיִּקַּח֙ <WH3947> that he took אֶת־ <WH853> לֵאָ֣ה <WH3812> Leah בִתּ֔וֹ <WH1323> his daughter וַיָּבֵ֥א <WH935> and brought אֹתָ֖הּ <WH853> אֵלָ֑יו <WH413> about וַיָּבֹ֖א <WH935> her to him and he went in אֵלֶֽיהָ׃ <WH413> also

וַיִּתֵּ֤ן <WH5414> gave לָבָן֙ <WH3837> And Laban לָ֔הּ אֶת־ <WH853> זִלְפָּ֖ה <WH2153> Zilpah שִׁפְחָת֑וֹ <WH8198> his maid לְלֵאָ֥ה <WH3812> Leah בִתּ֖וֹ <WH1323> unto his daughter שִׁפְחָֽה׃ <WH8198> [for] an handmaid

וַיְהִ֣י <WH1961> came בַבֹּ֔קֶר <WH1242> And it came to pass that in the morning וְהִנֵּה־ <WH2009> behold הִ֖וא <WH1931> it was לֵאָ֑ה <WH3812> behold it [was] Leah וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> and he said אֶל־ <WH413> to לָבָ֗ן <WH3837> to Laban מַה־ <WH4100> What זֹּאת֙ <WH2063> you עָשִׂ֣יתָ <WH6213> What [is] this thou hast done לִּ֔י הֲלֹ֤א <WH3808> for בְרָחֵל֙ <WH7354> Rachel עָבַ֣דְתִּי <WH5647> unto me? did not I serve עִמָּ֔ךְ <WH5973> with וְלָ֖מָּה <WH4100> Why רִמִּיתָֽנִי׃ <WH7411> deceived

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said לָבָ֔ן <WH3837> And Laban לֹא־ <WH3808> must not be so יֵעָשֶׂ֥ה <WH6213> It must not be so done כֵ֖ן <WH3651> in בִּמְקוֹמֵ֑נוּ <WH4725> in our country לָתֵ֥ת <WH5414> to give הַצְּעִירָ֖ה <WH6810> the younger לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before הַבְּכִירָֽה׃ <WH1067> the firstborn

מַלֵּ֖א <WH4390> Fulfil שְׁבֻ֣עַ <WH7620> week זֹ֑את <WH2063> her וְנִתְּנָ֨ה <WH5414> and we will give לְךָ֜ גַּם־ <WH1571> also אֶת־ <WH853> זֹ֗את <WH2063> for בַּעֲבֹדָה֙ <WH5656> thee this also for the service אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which תַּעֲבֹ֣ד <WH5647> which thou shalt serve עִמָּדִ֔י <WH5978> against ע֖וֹד <WH5750> again שֶֽׁבַע־ <WH7651> with me yet seven שָׁנִ֥ים <WH8141> years אֲחֵרֽוֹת׃ <WH312> other

וַיַּ֤עַשׂ <WH6213> did יַעֲקֹב֙ <WH3290> And Jacob כֵּ֔ן <WH3651> so וַיְמַלֵּ֖א <WH4390> so and fulfilled שְׁבֻ֣עַ <WH7620> her week זֹ֑את <WH2063> and he וַיִּתֶּן־ <WH5414> and he gave ל֛וֹ אֶת־ <WH853> רָחֵ֥ל <WH7354> him Rachel בִּתּ֖וֹ <WH1323> his daughter ל֥וֹ לְאִשָּֽׁה׃ <WH802> to wife

וַיִּתֵּ֤ן <WH5414> gave לָבָן֙ <WH3837> And Laban לְרָחֵ֣ל <WH7354> to Rachel בִּתּ֔וֹ <WH1323> his daughter אֶת־ <WH853> בִּלְהָ֖ה <WH1090> Bilhah שִׁפְחָת֑וֹ <WH8198> his handmaid לָ֖הּ לְשִׁפְחָֽה׃ <WH8198> to be her maid

וַיָּבֹא֙ <WH935> And he went in גַּ֣ם <WH1571> also אֶל־ <WH413> to רָחֵ֔ל <WH7354> also unto Rachel וַיֶּאֱהַ֥ב <WH157> and he loved גַּֽם־ <WH1571> and indeed אֶת־ <WH853> רָחֵ֖ל <WH7354> also Rachel מִלֵּאָ֑ה <WH3812> more than Leah וַיַּעֲבֹ֣ד <WH5647> and served עִמּ֔וֹ <WH5973> with ע֖וֹד <WH5750> again שֶֽׁבַע־ <WH7651> with him yet seven שָׁנִ֥ים <WH8141> years אֲחֵרֽוֹת׃ <WH312> other

וַיַּ֤רְא <WH7200> saw יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> And when the LORD כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for שְׂנוּאָ֣ה <WH8130> [was] hated לֵאָ֔ה <WH3812> that Leah וַיִּפְתַּ֖ח <WH6605> he opened אֶת־ <WH853> רַחְמָ֑הּ <WH7358> her womb וְרָחֵ֖ל <WH7354> but Rachel עֲקָרָֽה׃ <WH6135> [was] barren

וַתַּ֤הַר <WH2029> conceived לֵאָה֙ <WH3812> And Leah וַתֵּ֣לֶד <WH3205> and bare בֵּ֔ן <WH1121> a son וַתִּקְרָ֥א <WH7121> and she called שְׁמ֖וֹ <WH8034> his name רְאוּבֵ֑ן <WH7205> Reuben כִּ֣י <WH3588> for אָֽמְרָ֗ה <WH559> she said כִּֽי־ <WH3588> Surely רָאָ֤ה <WH7200> hath looked יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> the LORD בְּעָנְיִ֔י <WH6040> upon my affliction כִּ֥י <WH3588> now therefore עַתָּ֖ה <WH6258> now יֶאֱהָבַ֥נִי <WH157> will love אִישִֽׁי׃ <WH376> my husband

וַתַּ֣הַר <WH2029> And she conceived עוֹד֮ <WH5750> again וַתֵּ֣לֶד <WH3205> again and bare בֵּן֒ <WH1121> a son וַתֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> and said כִּֽי־ <WH3588> Because שָׁמַ֤ע <WH8085> hath heard יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Because the LORD כִּֽי־ <WH3588> Because שְׂנוּאָ֣ה <WH8130> that I [was] hated אָנֹ֔כִי <WH595> He וַיִּתֶּן־ <WH5414> he hath therefore given לִ֖י גַּם־ <WH1571> also אֶת־ <WH853> זֶ֑ה <WH2088> this וַתִּקְרָ֥א <WH7121> me this [son] also and she called שְׁמ֖וֹ <WH8034> his name שִׁמְעֽוֹן׃ <WH8095> Simeon

וַתַּ֣הַר <WH2029> And she conceived again עוֹד֮ <WH5750> again וַתֵּ֣לֶד <WH3205> and bare בֵּן֒ <WH1121> a son וַתֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> and said עַתָּ֤ה <WH6258> Now הַפַּ֙עַם֙ <WH6471> Now this time יִלָּוֶ֤ה <WH3867> be joined אִישִׁי֙ <WH376> will my husband אֵלַ֔י <WH413> to me כִּֽי־ <WH3588> because יָלַ֥דְתִּי <WH3205> unto me because I have born ל֖וֹ שְׁלֹשָׁ֣ה <WH7969> him three בָנִ֑ים <WH1121> sons עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּ֥ן <WH3651> after that קָרָֽא־ <WH7121> called שְׁמ֖וֹ <WH8034> therefore was his name לֵוִֽי׃ <WH3878> Levi

וַתַּ֨הַר <WH2029> And she conceived ע֜וֹד <WH5750> again וַתֵּ֣לֶד <WH3205> again and bare בֵּ֗ן <WH1121> a son וַתֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> and she said הַפַּ֙עַם֙ <WH6471> Now אוֹדֶ֣ה <WH3034> will I praise אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּ֛ן <WH3651> after that קָרְאָ֥ה <WH7121> therefore she called שְׁמ֖וֹ <WH8034> his name יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> Judah וַֽתַּעֲמֹ֖ד <WH5975> and left מִלֶּֽדֶת׃ <WH3205> bearing
